mapper.select: select s.id,s.title,s.content,s.first_picture,s.update_time,s.views,s.comment_count,s.liked,s.description, u.nick_name user_nick_name,s_t.name type_name,u.id user_id,u.nick_name user_nick_name,u.avatar user_avatar from strategy s join user u on s.user_id = u.id join strategy_type s_t on s.type_id = s_t.id where u.id = #{userId};

select s.id,s.title,s.content,s.first_picture,s.update_time,s.views,s.comment_count,s.liked,s.description, u.nick_name user_nick_name,u.id user_id,u.nick_name user_nick_name, s_t.name type_name,s_t.id type_id from strategy s join user u on s.user_id = u.id join strategy_type s_t on s.type_id = s_t.id where s.id = #{id};

select s.id,s.title,s.first_picture,s.update_time,s.views,s.comment_count,s.liked,s.description, u.nick_name user_nick_name,u.id user_id,u.avatar user_avatar, s_t.name type_name from strategy s join user u on s.user_id = u.id join strategy_type s_t on s.type_id = s_t.id where ((s.title like concat('%',#{title},'%')) or (s.content like concat('%',#{title},'%'))) and (s_t.id = #{id});
